situationSummary: Power frequency instability detected. Grid stability at risk. 5 nodes predicted to be impacted.
proposedAction: Initiate frequency stabilization protocol and load shedding
regulatoryBasis: Complies with NERC Reliability Standards, EOP-011 Statutory compliance: NERC Reliability Standards, EOP-011, Grid Stability Protocols, GSP-2026-02, NERC Reliability Standards, EOP-011.

actuatorBoundary.notes: No direct OT writes. Human authorization required for all actuator commands. This packet provides permission and coordination framework only.

outcomeSummary: 95% confidence frequency restored within stability band; load shed minimised.

statutoryCompliance.certificateStatement: This action was performed in accordance with EOP-011 of the NERC Reliability Standards: Maintain frequency within operational limits and coordinate with regional operators, GSP-2026-02 of the Grid Stability Protocols: Document all load shedding actions and restoration procedures. The authorized operator is protected under the statutory framework for emergency response actions during declared power_instability incidents.

statutoryBasis.requirement: Maintain frequency within operational limits and coordinate with regional operators
Document all load shedding actions and restoration procedures
